title: FIX THE PATCH LOOP - CONFIRMED FIX

embed.description: I currently found a fix, don't know if will work for everybody, but were it is. Link to the video

body:
I see a lot of people posting new threads and are missing this one.  I can confirm this guys fix works

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Khh6vj0A-fixing-patching-loop

replies.body: Hey Everyone I have fixed this issue. So this is caused because we all just got the new security update from windows last night.... Go into your security settings and Go to APP and Browsing Control and Turn it off completely!!!! This will fix your issue completely! and it takes 2 seconds!
Thanks for the heads up! That's definitely a weird way to get the issue solved, but I'm going to be testing this with anyone else who is still having the problem!
